title: Game Menu Design
subtitle: How we re-created the game menu screens addressing the UI inconsistencies and building interactive prototypes, for clearer communication of the client’s vision and a more streamlined development process.

about.name: Game Menu Design
about.desc: “1,000 Soldiers” is an ios shooting game, set in the second world war era. Here, we helped the client re-create the game menu screens in figma, following their pre-designed components and helped them visualize certain interactions through prototyping.

projectTeam.desc: The project’s design took 3 -4 weeks to complete.

projectDetails_1.heading: What Were Client Goal
projectDetails_1.desc:
• The client requested assistance in recreating game assets in Figma to ensure they are editable and easy for developers to inspect.
  • This approach aims to streamline the development process, simplify future updates, and make the designs more comprehensible for the development team.

projectDetails_1.heading: What We did
projectDetails_1.desc:
• Re-created the menu screens, improving the UI’s inconsistencies like spacing, colors, sizing, etc.
  • We also build some figma prototypes, showcasing certain interactions such as button pressing animation, inventory unlock animation and some notification popups.
  • This ensured that the game developers are communicated well about the client vision for the UI components and its interactions.
